attributes.action: Support Iran’s courageous people in their fight for freedom through
attributes.additional_details:
What must be done;

1- Condemn the Islamic Republic's violent behavior

 2- Ask the social media companies to help circumvent censorship and support for infrastructure to have free access to internet in Iran

 3- deny visas to all Islamic Republic officials to enter your country.

 4- Enact Magnitsky Sanctions against key actors and members of the IRGC and Regime responsible for these crackdowns
attributes.background: We ask you to join the Iranian people in their call for freedom.We ask you to use your voice and position to condemn in no uncertain terms, the barbaric actions of the regime. We ask you to stand with the Iranian people who chant on every street, WOMEN, LIFE, FREEDOM.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Maintain sanctions and introduce visa ban on people linked to Iranian regime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623572

Cut diplomatic ties with Iran in support of current nationwide uprisings: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623743

Condemn Iran for human rights violations linked to the regime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623749

Seek stronger international sanctions against Iran: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624662

Decisions about social media and internet access are a matter for social media and internet providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
